sentences.sContent: And that's going to require some very hard choices. And we're going to have to do that in a way that does not add unfairly to the burdens that the average American already faces.
sentences.sContent_eng: And that's going to require some very hard choices. And we're going to have to do that in a way that does not add unfairly to the burdens that the average American already faces.
sentences.sCn: 他还称,"这就需要作出一些十分困难的选择.我们达到此目的所采取的方式,将不会向普通美国人已面临的负担中,增加不公平的累赘."
